name: WorkingNoir
description:
Working Title Noir Game is a submission to the GameOff Game Jam, November 2022. The theme of the game jam is "Cliche", so some elements of the game may feel obvious or trope-y.

It's a top-down action adventure game featuring a hard-boiled detective framed for murder. Think Hotline Miami meets Ape-Out, in a hard-boiled universe.

Created in under a month, during exams, by a very small and otherwise very busy team, using the Godot game engine, version 3.51

Source Code available here: https://github.com/Cataclysmanic/GO2022
